description: [Brute Ratel C4](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1063) has used encrypted payload files and maintains an encrypted configuration structure in memory.(Citation: Palo Alto Brute Ratel July 2022)(Citation: MDSec Brute Ratel August 2022)
